nodes.text: Ajara was a gas giant planet located in the Cademimu sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories, situated in a partially explored region of space off the Celanon Spur. It was orbited by the jungle moon Ajan Kloss, which had two moons itself. Ajara's intense magnetic field shielded Ajan Kloss from cosmic radiation.
Ajara was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, a 2019 reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo.
